00039 #include "dataMoveZhemm.h"
00040 #include "defSC66.h"
00041 
00042 void dataMoveLZhemm(doublecomplex * restrict src, int m, int ld)
00043 {
00044   int iCnt, jCnt;
00045   double * restrict ptrS = (double *) src;
00046 
00047   for(iCnt = 0; iCnt < (m<<1); iCnt+=2)
00048   {
00049         for(jCnt = 0; jCnt<iCnt; jCnt+=2)
00050         {
00051           // real part
00052           ptrS[iCnt*ld+jCnt] = ptrS[jCnt*ld+iCnt];
00053           // complex part
00054           ptrS[iCnt*ld+jCnt+1] = -ptrS[jCnt*ld+iCnt+1];
00055         }
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void dataMoveUZhemm(doublecomplex * restrict src, int m, int ld)
00060 {
00061   int iCnt, jCnt;
00062   double * restrict ptrS = (double *) src;
00063 
00064   for(iCnt = 0; iCnt < (m<<1); iCnt+=2)
00065   {
00066         for(jCnt = 0; jCnt<iCnt; jCnt+=2)
00067         {
00068           // real part
00069           ptrS[jCnt*ld+iCnt] = ptrS[iCnt*ld+jCnt];
00070           // complex part
00071           ptrS[jCnt*ld+iCnt+1] = -ptrS[iCnt*ld+jCnt+1];
00072         }
00073   }
00074 }
